DOC.detailed_description: Food allergy incidence increase world wide . The diagnosis mostly depend history . Skin prick test atopic patch test useful find causative food case . The local food extract show least effective commercial one . From previous study investigator keep extract 2-8 degree Celsius 1-3 month usage . The investigator want evaluate duration extract still useful diagnosis food allergy
DOC.criteria: Positive skin prick test one food ( milk , egg , soy , wheat , seafood ) Chronic diseases heart disease , liver , renal severe sepsis Severe allergic symptom anaphylaxis Extensive skin rash Pregnancy
